abstract.text: Returns the value for the given key as an array of values converted using a
type.

inlineContent.text: Value converted to an array of the requested type.
If the underlying payload value is a String, and the result type is expected to be a String array
, this function will automatically split the value by whitespaces.

abstract.text: Library that provides foundational features used by Oktaâ€™s authentication libraries, as well as APIs used to work with tokens and user credentials.
Indicates a type can be consumed from a
object and converted to the indicated type.
Used by classes that contains OAuth2 claims.
User profile information.
